verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: bought] [ARG1: a cheap milanese loop band for my new apple watch] [ARGM-ADV: whether you 're treating yourself to a new apple watch or want a way to class up an older model] this 14 milanese loop band is an excellent choice it comes in sizes that fit both the 38 mm 40 mm and 42 mm 44 mm apple watch colors that match its outer case and a price that puts the official apple ver apple brg milanese loop
